:lcPlanAudience-insert-lcAge.label: t__Add age
:lcPlanAudience-insert-lcAge.description: t__Provides the age range of the intended learner audience, for use by curriculum developers and course planners.

:insert-lcAge.label: t__Age
:insert-lcAge.description: t__Provides the age range of the intended learner audience, for use by curriculum developers and course planners.

:lcTask-insert-lcAttitude.label: t__Add attitude
:lcTask-insert-lcAttitude.description: t__Describes mental state that influences the choices of personal actions.

:insert-lcAttitude.label: t__Attitude
:insert-lcAttitude.description: t__Describes mental state that influences the choices of personal actions.

:lcPlanAudience-insert-lcBackground.label: t__Add background
:lcPlanAudience-insert-lcBackground.description: t__Provides the learners' professional background and the relevancy to the learning plan.

:insert-lcBackground.description: t__Provides the learners' professional background and the relevancy to the learning plan.

:lcPlanAudience-insert-lcEdLevel.label: t__Add education level
:lcPlanAudience-insert-lcEdLevel.description: t__Provides the range of learners' education level and the relevancy to the learning plan.

:insert-lcEdLevel.description: t__Provides the range of learners' education level and the relevancy to the learning plan.

:contextual-insert-lcGeneralDescription.label: t__Add general description
:contextual-insert-lcGeneralDescription.description: t__Provides a space to develop a general description about the organization's training needs.

:insert-lcGeneralDescription.label: t__General description
:insert-lcGeneralDescription.description: t__Provides a space to develop a general description about the organization's training needs.

:lcOrganizational-insert-lcGoals.label: t__Add goals
:lcOrganizational-insert-lcGoals.description: t__Provides the outcomes desired by the organization to be addressed by the training effort. These goals can require concurrent efforts outside of training such as technology acquisition, reorganization, and so forth.

:insert-lcGoals.label: t__Goals
:insert-lcGoals.description: t__Provides the outcomes desired by the organization to be addressed by the training effort. These goals can require concurrent efforts outside of training such as technology acquisition, reorganization, and so forth.

:contextual-insert-lcKnowledge.label: t__Add knowledge
:contextual-insert-lcKnowledge.description: t__Describes the learner's current knowledge and the relevancy to the broader plan audience or a specific task in the plan.

:insert-lcKnowledge.label: t__Knowledge
:insert-lcKnowledge.description: t__Describes the learner's current knowledge and the relevancy to the broader plan audience or a specific task in the plan.

:lcPlanAudience-insert-lcMotivation.label: t__Add motivation
:lcPlanAudience-insert-lcMotivation.description: t__Provides the reasons why the learners want and/or need to take the instruction.

:insert-lcMotivation.label: t__Motivation
:insert-lcMotivation.description: t__Provides the reasons why the learners want and/or need to take the instruction.

:lcOrganizational-insert-lcNeeds.label: t__Add needs
:lcOrganizational-insert-lcNeeds.description: t__Provides the needs behind the outcomes described by the goals.

:insert-lcNeeds.label: t__Needs
:insert-lcNeeds.description: t__Provides the needs behind the outcomes described by the goals.

:insert-lcNeedsAnalysis.label: t__Needs analysis
:insert-lcNeedsAnalysis.description: t__Describes the training requirement and identifies the need to develop or revise content. These include periodic training gap analyses, changes to operational or maintenance requirements, and changes to equipment or systems.

:lcNeedsAnalysis-insert-title.label: t__Add title
:lcNeedsAnalysis-insert-title.description: t__Add a title to this needs analysis section.

:lcOrganizational-insert-title.label: t__Add title
:lcOrganizational-insert-title.description: t__Add a title to this organizational section.

:lcOrganizational-insert-lcOrgConstraint.label: t__Add organizational constraints
:lcOrganizational-insert-lcOrgConstraint.description: t__Provides organizational aspects that can limit the organization's ability to effectively use the instruction to meet its goals.

:insert-lcOrgConstraints.label: t__Organizational constraints
:insert-lcOrgConstraints.description: t__Provides organizational aspects that can limit the organization's ability to effectively use the instruction to meet its goals.

:lcNeedsAnalysis-insert-lcPlanAudience.description: t__Describes characteristics of the learners who take the instruction.

:contextual-insert-lcSkills.label: t__Add skills
:contextual-insert-lcSkills.description: t__Describes the learners' current skill set and the relevancy to the broader plan audience or a specific task in the plan.

:insert-lcSkills.label: t__Skills
:insert-lcSkills.description: t__Describes the learners' current skill set and the relevancy to the broader plan audience or a specific task in the plan.

:lcPlanAudience-insert-lcSpecChars.label: t__Add specific characteristics
:lcPlanAudience-insert-lcSpecChars.description: t__Provides learner characteristics specific to the population that will influence the design, including learning disabilities, physical handicaps, and so forth.

:insert-lcSpecChars.description: t__Provides learner characteristics specific to the population that will influence the design, including learning disabilities, physical handicaps, and so forth.
